title: One-stop hub for tech enthusiasts! Hyderabad Metro launches electronics and technology mall, e-Galleria - The Financial Express
content:
1. One-stop hub for tech enthusiasts! Hyderabad Metro launches electronics and technology mall, e-Galleria  The Financial Express

description: The e-Galleria's key attractions are exclusive brand stores- a premium setting offering people a world-class experience where global technology brands are laid out to be explored.
